context.rdfs:comment: A music recording (track), usually a single song.
context.rdfs:label: MusicRecording

properties.rdfs:comment: The composition this track is a recording of.
properties.rdfs:label: recordingOf

properties.rdfs:comment: The International Standard Recording Code for the recording.
properties.rdfs:label: isrcCode

properties.rdfs:comment: The album to which this recording belongs.
properties.rdfs:label: inAlbum

properties.rdfs:comment: The playlist to which this recording belongs.
properties.rdfs:label: inPlaylist
